aboutText: Motivated Computer Science graduate with hands-on experience in mobile app development and technical support. Developed two fully functional mobile applications using Flutter and Dart, currently in the final stages of deployment. Completed a 6-month internship in IT support, including hardware diagnostics, software troubleshooting, and remote assistance. Also trained briefly in the field of information security. Strong problem-solving skills with a passion for technology and helping users.

items.title: Technical Support Specialist (Tamheer)
items.location: Northern Border University, Arar | Dec 2023 â€“ Jun 2024
description: Provided remote support via phone & tools.
Formatted devices, replaced components, and assigned new systems.
Documented resolutions to enhance support efficiency.

items.title: Information Security Intern
description: Observed procedures for managing user access control and data protection.
Reviewed basic network security practices and internal policy enforcement.
Learned documentation practices and basic risk identification procedures.

items.title: Muslim Companion App
items.description: An integrated Muslim companion, providing prayer times, Qibla direction, Azkar, and the Holy Quran.

items.title: Trip Cost App
items.description: A tool for delivery drivers to track trip costs and profits, calculating fuel and maintenance.
